subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After fiery pieces of a two-ton racecar flew into the stands during the Nationwide on Saturday, it was hard to pretend everything was normal.
snippet: After fiery pieces of a two-ton racecar flew into the stands during the Nationwide on Saturday, it was hard to pretend everything was normal.
